front.title: IAB and IESG Recommendation for IETF Administrative Restructuring

abstract.t: This document describes a joint recommendation of the Internet Architecture Board and the Internet Engineering Steering Group for administrative restructuring of the Internet Engineering Task Force. This recommendation will be discussed on the IETF list (ietf@ietf.org), and the IETF leadership will attempt to determine if there is IETF consensus in going forward with this plan through a Last Call process.
